The Lord of the Rings 1977 Calendar

wikitext.*:
{{book | title=The Hobbit Calendar 1976 | image = The Hobbit Calendar 1976.jpg | illustrator=[[J.R.R. Tolkien]] | editor= | publisher=[[George Allen and Unwin|George Allen & Unwin]] (UK) | date=[[1975]] | format=Wire-bound calendar with mailer (137⁄8 x 151⁄2 inches) | pages= | isbn=0-04-549002-4 | precededby=None. Last calendar:
[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1974 (UK)|The J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1974]] | followedby=[[The Lord of the Rings 1977 Calendar]] }} '''''The Hobbit Calendar 1976''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[George Allen and Unwin|George Allen & Unwin]] in [[1975]]. It features art by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]''. ==Contents== * Cover - [[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - The Hobbit Dustcover.png|From the jacket of the original edition]] [of ''[[The Hobbit]]''] * January - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Beorn's Hall (Colored by H. E. Riddett).jpg|Beorn's Hall]]" Coloured by [[H.E. Riddett]] * February - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - The Trolls (Colored by H.E. Riddett).jpg|The Trolls]]" * March - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - The Misty Mountains looking West from the Eyrie towards Goblin Gate (Colored by H.E. Riddett).jpg|The Misty Mountains]]" * April - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - The Hill - Hobbiton-across-the-Water (Colored).jpg|The Hill: Hobbiton-across-the Water]]" * May - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Rivendell.jpg|Rivendell]]" * June - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Bilbo comes to the Huts of the Raft-elves (II).jpg|Bilbo comes to the Huts of the Raft-elves]]" * July - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - The Elvenking's Gate (II) (Colored by H. E. Riddett).jpg|The Elvenking's Gate]]" * August - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Lake Town (Colored by H. E. Riddett).jpg|Lake Town]]" * September - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Bilbo woke with the early sun in his eyes.jpg|Bilbo woke with the early sun in his eyes]]" * October - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - The Front Gate (Colored by H.E. Riddett).png|The Front Gate]]" * November - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - The Mountain-path (Colored by H.E. Riddett).png|The Mountain-path]]" * December - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Conversation with Smaug (large).jpg|Conversation with Smaug]]" ===Note=== ==Variants== File:The Hobbit Calendar 1976 (Canada).jpg| '''''The Hobbit Calendar 1976'''''
